stories.title: The Lost Puppy
stories.text: Mia found a small puppy in her yard. The puppy was brown and white. It looked lost and hungry. Mia gave the puppy some water. She made signs to find the owner. The next day, a boy came to get his puppy. He was so happy!
stories.what: Mia found a lost puppy and helped find its owner
stories.why: The puppy was lost and hungry

stories.title: The Big Race
stories.text: Tom wanted to win the race. He practiced running every day. On race day, he ran as fast as he could. He did not win first place. But he beat his own best time! Tom was proud of himself.
stories.what: Tom ran in a race and beat his best time
stories.why: He wanted to do his best

stories.title: Making Cookies
stories.text: Grandma and Lily made cookies. They mixed flour and sugar. They added eggs and butter. Lily helped stir the dough. They baked the cookies in the oven. The cookies smelled so good! They ate cookies with cold milk.

retell_stories.title: The Seed
retell_stories.beginning: Sam planted a seed in the ground.
retell_stories.middle: He watered it every day. The seed grew into a small plant.
retell_stories.end: The plant grew big and made beautiful flowers.
retell_stories.message: Taking care of things helps them grow

retell_stories.title: The Bike
retell_stories.beginning: Emma got a new bike for her birthday.
retell_stories.middle: She tried to ride it but kept falling. Her dad helped her practice.
retell_stories.end: After many tries, Emma could ride all by herself!
retell_stories.message: Practice helps you learn new things
